content.prompt: A researcher hypothesizes that RNA molecules were present in the most recent common ancestor of all living organisms. Which of the following scientific questions would best test the hypothesis?

choices.label: Is it possible to produce an RNA polymer in a laboratory setting?
How many distinct functions can a particular RNA molecule perform in a cell?
How many different monomers of RNA are found in a eukaryotic cell?
Do any known organisms function entirely without RNA?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify or pose a testable question based on an observation, data, or a model.
